author: CNET
description:
Amazon has unveiled three new Kindle Scribe tablet e-readers, which are due to be released in the coming months. They aren't cheap. Here are some early first impressions from CNET editor David Carnoy.

0:00 Introducing the New Kindle Scribe and Scribe Colorsoft Lineup
0:16 Weight and Thickness of the Kindle Scribe Colorsoft
0:52 Prices
1:13 AI Features
1:36 Stories So Far
1:43 Ask This Book
2:06 Scribe vs reMarkable's Paper Pro
2:52 Why Choose The Kindle Scribes
3:27 Full Review to Follow
